name: Big Red Chicken (Ypsilon, Wampy)
description:
Fly the big red chicken through multiple levels of difficulty, and eat bugs to score combos and increase your score!

Flap left wing : Left click or Left arrow or A or J

Flap right wing : Right click or Right arrow or D or L

Flap both wings at once to gain height Catch bugs without touching the ground to get a combo that multiplies your score

You can pause at any time with the P button.

This game was made for the One Game A Month #6 jam.

This is an improved and polished version of a game made at the beginning of November 2021 for the Video Game Labs game jam, here: https://shertigan.itch.io/big-red-chicken

Shertigan : Sound

Wampy : Art

Ypsilon : Programming
